title: Bug 124777 - Exception When Setting Blank Tooltip in Chart Title During Preview
description: When setting a blank tooltip in the chart title, it causes an exception to occur during preview.
OB: When a blank tooltip is set in the chart title, an unexpected exception dialog pops up during preview.
EB: During preview, when moving the mouse over the chart title that has a blank tooltip, nothing should happen. There should be no unexpected exception dialogs.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the chart in the viewer.
2. Move the mouse over the chart title with a blank tooltip.
